20110113073559.000|20110113073602.000|CC1|AFTER FIVE DAYS OF ANGUISH AND  
20110113073602.000|20110113073604.000|CC1|ANGER, TUCSON AND REALLY THE    
20110113073604.000|20110113073606.000|CC1|WHOLE NATION WAS DUE FOR AN     
20110113073606.000|20110113073607.000|CC1|EMOTIONAL CLEANSING TONIGHT.    
20110113073607.000|20110113073608.000|CC1|25,000 PEOPLE SHOWED UP AT A    
20110113073608.000|20110113073610.000|CC1|COLLEGE ARENA THAT SEATS HALF

20110113074303.000|20110113074305.000|CC1|THIS TO BE ABOUT POLITIC, BUT IN

20110113074323.000|20110113074325.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS ARE EXPLOITING THE    
20110113074325.000|20110113074326.000|CC1|TRAGEDY.                        
20110113074326.000|20110113074327.000|CC1|BETTER ANGELS HAVE BEEN SHOVED  
20110113074327.000|20110113074330.000|CC1|ASIDE BIPARTISAN DEMONS.        
20110113074330.000|20110113074332.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT TONIGHT
